doc.field: [Mostly material on prisoners of war in Spain] Letters: Carl Geiser to JB re: Cuba; re: Prisoners of the Good Fight;Jacob K. Javits to JB; JB personal correspondence Typescripts include: "Statement to the United Nations by Second Latin American Conference on Amnesty for Political Prisoners and Exiles of Spain and Portugal"; "A Report on Civil Rights and the Position of Political Offenders in Spain," compiled by group of international lawyers after 1960 visit to Madrid; "The Unknown Soldier as a Symbol of the Spanish Civil War," speech given by Charles Nusser at 47th Annual VALB Celebration; "Statement of the World Federation of Democratic Youth Bureau on the Murder of the Spanish Democrat and Patriot, Julian Grimau"; "International Volunteers/Former Members of the Spanish Republican Army Now in Concentration Camps," Felix Kusman, director of Campaign for International Volunteers Records: Communist Party assessments of four released ALB prisoners: Fred Borer, Edward Johnson, Claude Pringle, Herman Carl Riffe Pamphlets: Spanish Political and Religious Prisoners,Alfred G. Tucker; Mensaje a la Asemblea de las Naciones Unidas, Primera Conferencia Sudamericana Pro Amnistía para los Presos y Exilados Políticos de España y Portugal(1960)

Tucker; Mensaje a la Asemblea de las Naciones Unidas, Primera Conferencia Sudamericana Pro Amnistía para los Presos y Exilados Políticos de España y Portugal(1960)

Series I: Scrapbooks >> [Mostly material on prisoners of war in Spain] Letters: Carl Geiser to JB re: Cuba; re: Prisoners of the Good Fight;Jacob K. Javits to JB; JB personal correspondence Typescripts include: "Statement to the United Nations by Second Latin American Conference on Amnesty for Political Prisoners and Exiles of Spain and Portugal"; "A Report on Civil Rights and the Position of Political Offenders in Spain," compiled by group of international lawyers after 1960 visit to Madrid; "The Unknown Soldier as a Symbol of the Spanish Civil War," speech given by Charles Nusser at 47th Annual VALB Celebration; "Statement of the World Federation of Democratic Youth Bureau on the Murder of the Spanish Democrat and Patriot, Julian Grimau"; "International Volunteers/Former Members of the Spanish Republican Army Now in Concentration Camps," Felix Kusman, director of Campaign for International Volunteers Records: Communist Party assessments of four released ALB prisoners: Fred Borer, Edward Johnson, Claude Pringle, Herman Carl Riffe Pamphlets: Spanish Political and Religious Prisoners,Alfred G. Tucker; Mensaje a la Asemblea de las Naciones Unidas, Primera Conferencia Sudamericana Pro Amnistía para los Presos y Exilados Políticos de España y Portugal(1960)
